attributes.action: Create laws to protect all static caravan owners around the UK
attributes.additional_details: The static caravan site is an unregulated minefield and people around the United Kingdom are being left out of pocket in every which way, from buying the van for thousands more than they’re worth, and when people can’t afford them because of the “hidden fees” the vans being bought back for thousands less. I would like protection for the millions of people that own such vans
attributes.background: Laws passed to protect people that are being ripped off at every turn when buying and up keeping their static caravan purchase on Holidays sites around the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about how static caravan owners are protected, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
